dw:transform-message.doc:name: Create JSON response for Portal
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/json --- payload.entry map using (practitioner = $.resource) { id : practitioner.id, name : { family : practitioner.name[0].family[0], given : practitioner.name[0].given[0], prefix : practitioner.name[0].prefix[0], suffix : practitioner.name[0].suffix[0] }, phone : (practitioner.telecom filter $.system == "phone")[0].value, email : (practitioner.telecom filter $.system == "email")[0].value, fax : (practitioner.telecom filter $.system == "fax")[0].value, address : { line : practitioner.address[0].line[0], city : practitioner.address[0].city, country : practitioner.address[0].country, postalCode : practitioner.address[0].postalCode }, gender : practitioner.gender, birthDate : practitioner.birthDate } when payload.total > 0 otherwise []

dw:transform-message.doc:name: prepare request
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/json --- { patientId : flowVars.id, practitionerId : payload.practitionerID, slotId : payload.slotID }

Prepare response
